::KitKat::

She watched Terrorsaur leave.  She walked over and layed down in a 
corner.  It felt good to know that she had friends around her.  She 
knew that in time, she would repay them for being nice to her.  
She rested a bit and slowly fell asleep in the corner near the 
entrance of the base.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Talon Harvilicz <talon_the_rider@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> Terrorsaur:
>  
> 
> "Don't worry," Terrorsaur reassured KitKat. "We got plenty of bots. 
I'll go get that arm of yours." He took off into the air and flew 
past the mouth of the cave. After that, he transformed to beast mode.
>
